transcript:
Customer: Tum lagatar teen din se ticket ke khel rahe ho na?

Hello?
Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hi, good afternoon sir. Am I audible?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Uh sir, I am Anshika calling you from IndiaMART head office, right? Today you have received a call from your account manager, right? And you have given the, uh, given him, uh, rating regarding not satisfied. Do you have any issue with your account manager?
Customer: No, no, it was a mistake. Subsequently, I just changed it to satisfied like that.
Executive: Accha, okay, mistakenly it will happen, right?
Customer: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.
Executive: Okay, I just thought like you're having some issue with your account manager, that's why I just want to connect with you, etc. So, main yahan par update kar deti hu. Actually, aap unko rating dete ho, haan, unke upar rating aa gayi ki unhone shayad kuch aisa kiya hai. Is wajah se connection call aayi hai meri. Okay, sir, koi concern hai ki aapka kuch aisa abhi service vagerah thoda use vagerah kar rahe hain aap? I
Customer: Nahi, wohi nahi hai. Woh scheduled hai. 5:00 baje kuch connect karte hai bola hai. Let him.
Executive: Haan, haan, correct, correct. Koi baat nahi, woh connect, woh aapse connect kar lega 5:00 baje. Uh, sir, ek baar meeting ke regarding, but thoda sa na service vagerah use kariye sir. Byleads conduction bilkul zero ho gaya aapka.
Customer: Dekhiye, woh kya hota hai byleads, abhi bhi dekh raha hu main, 99% mujhe use nahi hota hai. Uske liye kya hota hai, mera time waste ho jata hai. Pehle pehle dekha hai humne, uh, woh kya hai, categorize mein galat ho gaye, kya hai byleads, pura itna byleads rehta hai, woh byleads unwanted byleads hi rehta hai na.
Executive: Accha, matlab irrelevant aata hai and that's why you do not relevant to your product. Okay, okay.
Customer: Yes, yes, yes, yes.
Executive: So, so we can do one thing, sir. The your account manager person, he will be going to connect with you like through the video meeting, right? Woh video meeting ke through aapse connect karega. Usme aapko jo bhi problem ho rahi hai na ki mere ko irrelevant aa rahi hai, ye product main nahi sale karta, phir bhi mere ko iski aa rahi hai, toh woh sab negative mark karwa denge. Isse kya hai thoda sa profile pe work bhi ho jayega aur kuch cheeze hum side by side guide kar denge ki aapko kaise use karna hai. Kyunki thoda bahut aapko active hona padega sir. Because see, without your activation you are getting the seven calls from the IndiaMART, right? Aap koi activity nahi kar rahe ho, byleads consume nahi kar rahe tab bhi aapko seven calls aa rahi hai buyer ki IndiaMART se. So, I am just suggesting agar hum thoda bahut bhi profile ko use karna shuru kar de, toh hum zyada call le payenge buyer ki. Right? Jabki aap calls jo jitni buyer ki call aati hai aap saari answer kar rahe ho, that is a good thing. Right? But hamara deal jo conduction hai, byleads conduction hai, woh zero ho rakha hai last 30 days se.
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: Toh agar hum jo bhi aapko problem aa rahi hai irrelevant wali, isko hum thoda solution karte hain. Account manager aapse connect karenge, toh aap bata dijiyega mere ko isme isme deal nahi karna, ye ye mere product hai, toh woh on call hi sab kuch correct ho jayega. Right? Usse phir kya hoga ki aapko thoda bahut active rahega thoda din mein matlab ek do din mein matlab byleads kuch na kuch open consume karte rahiye jisse kya hai call ka traffic badhe thoda sa.
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: Hai na? Theek hai. Toh woh cheez thoda ho jayega, account thoda properly chalne lagega. And kuch bhi aapko aisa lagta hai na ki mere ko business nahi aa raha hai sir, toh we are here to help you sir. Aap ek baar hume bataoge ki ye cheez nahi mil raha hai toh definitely hum usme finding karenge ki kya solution ho sakta hai kya nahi. See dekhiye aapne service toh li hai IndiaMART ke saath, paid supplier hain, amount bhi pay kar rakha hai. But agar if you are not using, we cannot help you sir. Because ultimately byleads aapko consume karna hai, buyer se interaction aapko karna hai. Hum yahan par aapki profile mein bata sakte hain.
Customer: Nahi woh kya hai na, humko category, ye ye category create hona chahiye kya wall ka, wall limit switch bola toh ye kya hai na. See, woh generalize category hai. Limit switch. Toh wall control system aapka product nahi hai?
Customer: Haan, wall control, wall control ka system se wall ka switch box hai, switch box par walls bol ke hota hai. Abhi, abhi mujhe milta hai woh junction box, electric switch, woh ghar ka switch, ghar ka switch, woh sabhi hum deal nahi karte hain.
Executive: Toh main bata rahi hu ye kyun problem aa rahi hogi. Aapke product vagerah mein na added hoga ye keyword kahin na kahin. Aur kabhi past mein kabhi ye leads consume hui hogi. That is why you are getting these kind of byleads. Main samajh gayi. Aapka maine bhi abhi account open kiya jisme mere ko dikh raha hai aap electric switch mein bhi deal kar rahe ho aisa mere ko dikh raha hai. Aur ye butterfly walls hai, junction box hai, in sab saari product mein aap deal kar rahe ho. That is why you are getting these kind of byleads. Toh maybe ye product kahin na kahin added hai aapke product team, product mein. That is why you are getting the irrelevant. Toh isi wajah se ek kaam karte hain account manager ek baar connect kar leti hu. Theek hai? Aap bata doge toh woh remove ho jayega. Zyada time nahi required hoga but haan ye sir rahega ki correction ho jayega toh thoda manage karna hamare liye bhi aasan ho jayega. Hum zyada se zyada frequently aapse connect honge toh woh jitni zyada problem hai woh jaldi jaldi resolve hoti jayegi. Right? Aisa kar lete hain. But ye person jo abhi appoint kiya aapko Tejas, he is very good in service sir, right? He is deep knowledge about every product and like in your industry he has worked on, right? So he has aware about what kind of product you are dealing. So he will be definitely help you on this sir, right? But we need to coordinate with him sir, right? So I am just closing this feedback which you are given to Tejas, right? Hum ye feedback close karte hain, hai na? Baaki connect kar lete hain.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Okay sir, thank you sir.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received call regarding rating feedback.

- Customer is receiving irrelevant buyleads.

- Customer's buylead conduction is zero.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed it was a mistake.

- Executive will have account manager connect with customer.

- Account manager will remove irrelevant products.

- Executive suggested to consume buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Account manager will connect with customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, account manager, product category
